Posts.EditableText: Hello to all. I have now made full individual hints in all individual locations to help you out of the areas (Just type in hint or hints in any location and the hint menu will get you through, but only if you are really stuck) and remember this is only the basic commands to get you to the finish, there are many solutions to various problems. Happy Adventuring
